name: WordPress Broken Link Checker by AIOSEO plugin缺少授权漏洞
product: ["WordPress Broken Link Checker by AIOSEO plugin <=1.2.5"]
description: WordPress Broken Link Checker by AIOSEO plugin是一款用于检测和修复网站内部及外部链接的工具，支持SEO优化和网站维护。WordPress Broken Link Checker by AIOSEO plugin存在缺少授权漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致未经授权的文章修改。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网:
https://wordpress.org/plugins/broken-link-checker-seo
patch: WordPress Broken Link Checker by AIOSEO plugin缺少授权漏洞的补丁
